exercise.title: This is the title: Exercise 1
exercise.sentence:
The flight is late so there's
a delay. an aisle. a terminal.

Lots of people are waiting to check in so there's
luggage. a queue. a gate.

Our flight is departing from _____ M78.
terminal queue gate

Would you like a window or an aisle
seat? chair? place?

Are you flying in business
standard? class? seat?

You can only take _____ luggage on the plane.
hand little carry

You have to show your passport at passport
check. gate. control.

In the airport there is Wi-Fi internet _____ for business travellers.
enter access computer

My flight was _____ so it was impossible to fly to the meeting in New York.
cancelled ended controlled

When _____ back from Prague?
you coming do you coming are you coming

Is he _____ to have dinner with you in Madrid?
going goes go

Are you going to see Jennifer?
No, I not, but I am going to meet Louise. No, I not going, but I am going to meet Louise. No, I'm not, but I am going to meet Louise.

We're going
offer you some work. to offer you some work. offering you some work.

I _____ going to come to the office at the weekend.
won't 'm not don't

We're going _____ in the evening.
go out to going out out

I'm going to take Friday off
to have a long weekend. to present the sales figures. to work in the office.

We're going to speak to our customers
present our new products. to presenting our new products. to present our new products.

Can I pay _____ credit card?
of by from

I have a _____ for tonight.
reserve reserving reservation

What's the _____ of your credit card?
expiry time expiry day expiry date

What time is breakfast
serve? to serve? served?

Can I have a _____-up call please?
wake get alarm

_____ like to book a room for the night.
I I'd I'll

I need your
card credit details. details credit card. credit card details.

Do I need _____ a table?
book to book booking
